content: सेवनं [सिव्-सेव्-ल्युट्] {@--1@} The act of serving, service, attendance upon, worship; पात्रीकृतात्मा गुरुसेवनेन <ls>R. 18. 30</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 11.</ls> {@--2@} Following, practising, employing; <ls>Ms. 12. 52.</ls> {@--3@} Using, enjoying. {@--4@} Enjoying carnally; यत्करोत्येकरात्रेण वृषलीसेवनाद्द्विजः <ls>Ms. 11. 179.</ls> {@--5@} Devotion to, fondness for. {@--6@} Frequenting, dwelling in. {@--7@} Binding, fastening. {@--8@} Sewing, stitching. {@--9@} A sack.
